extendedInfo.description: Sun Flashlight App â Free. *  Screen has a summer sun,  warm bright glowing color. *  Turns on the Camera Flash LED if available. *  Keeps the Screen Brightness at Maximum. *  An Automatic Timer Exits Application after 90 Seconds. *  Audio Effects on Start and Stop. *  Countdown Timer Warning before Automatic Exit. *  Unobtrusive Ads. *  Best Flashlight for soft lighting. *  Provides a positive light, feeling of an upbeat lifestyle.This flashlight app is a classy addition to any free flashlight collection.  The warm color of the sun is proven to improve the mood of many people â this flashlight app provides a âlittle piece of the sunâ, while also serving as a fully functional, bright flashlight.  For those devices that have a camera flash LED, and which support the Android camera platform fully, the camera LED is turned on maximum making it one of the brightest flashlights on the market.The Sun Flashlight App attempts to be as energy efficient as possible, and provides an automatic timer that turns off the flashlight after 90 seconds.  Just in case you stow away the phone forgetting to shut down the app, Sun Flashlight will automatically power down fully, saving your battery.  There is a warning beeper just before shutdown, in case you are in the middle of using the light at 90 seconds.  A simple touch or tap on the screen extends the flashlight for another 90 seconds.  This feature helps make Sun Flashlight one of the best flashlights on the market!So try Sun Flashlight today â itâs free â with no hidden costs or fees.In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen.Search Homepage.This will help us bring you more great apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.

reviews.title: Works very well for my needs.
reviews.comment: Bright, stays on long enough for my needs, unlocking my door, saving electricity, getting out of bed at 0430 until I can get to a lamp. I like it.
reviews.author: Linda Salazar

reviews.title: Awesome flashlight app
reviews.comment: Tried 4 others, and hands down, this was the best of the bunch. For sheer illumination alone, it was amazingly brighter than the others, and conveniently, it requires only one touch from home screen to activate. \"Great for blind dummies like me!\"
reviews.author: bryan gillette

reviews.title: Don\'t need a sound effect
reviews.comment: Come on, people...sound effects for EVERYTHING?  What happened to silence?  I just need a flashlight app.
reviews.author: Li My

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.comment: It does what it says gave it 4 stars for that. Although I\'m removeing it either way becuz I\'m looking for a flashlight with a simple small widget that you can just click an it turns on the flash light with out having to open the whole app; and i found one. Sll you do is click the widget an it turns on and you may open your web browser or texts or anything while keeping the flashlight on its awesome.  Tho I\'ll not name it here sorry and enjoy this good working app.
